extends greenfoot.Actor

This actor represents a basic enemy.

Method Detail

act

public void act()
This method is called whenever the game environment acts or runs. Allows the boss to shoot and be destroyed by Laser or RobotHero actors.

Overrides:
act in class greenfoot.Actor

public void fire()
This method fires an EvilLaser actor.

selfDestruct

public void selfDestruct()
This method deletes the enemy when it collides with a Laser or RobotHero.
